protein.specific_function: Involved in lifespan determination in ubiquinone-independent manner. Involved in ubiquinone biosynthesis. Potential central metabolic regulator (By similarity).

go_class.description: mitochondrial ATP synthesis coupled electron transport

reference.reference_text: Asaumi S, Kuroyanagi H, Seki N, Shirasawa T: Orthologues of the Caenorhabditis elegans longevity gene clk-1 in mouse and human. Genomics. 1999 Jun 15;58(3):293-301.
